Reviews.Title: I adore this camera.
Reviews.Author: FromIdaho
Reviews.Content: This was a big step up from the Nikon 1 J1. Fortunately all my lenses work just fine with the 1 V1 and it is a much more professional grade camera for a serious amateur that does not want to lug heavy equipment around. The picture quality is very good. The automatic features work better than any camera I have ever owned including some 35mm SLRs. If you make your living as a photographer this won't be your go to camera, however, you still might want to consider the 1 series those situations where smaller and lighter would make the difference.
